name: afterthought (itch)
description:
Game was made for Ludum Dare 46.

Your girlfriend left you. You are trying to recall the small details that led to these unpleasant events so that you can sort things out and keep a relationship. 

Recover your memories by placing missing items to the right spots. 

Controls: 
W/A/S/D - movement
RMB - cycle thoughts
Hold LMB - hold an item 

Code, Music: Stepan Masychev (Steff)
Art, Gamedesign: Dmitrii Obukhov (Rion)

We are not native english speakers, sorry for possible bad writing.
